name: Ice Age: Scrat-Ventures
description: Ice age: Scrat‘s world - help all favorite character from Ice age, squirrel Scrat, collect fruits on a variety of levels. Cheerful Scrat continues on his chase to catch the elusive acorn in this Android game. Control the running hero. Jump over pits and from one platform to another. Jump on heads of different prehistoric predators and defeat them. Collect different fruits on your way. Go through ice, dinosaur and other worlds. Lead Scrat forwards, that's where the acorn is.
